name: Big + Bang: A Spatial Medical Adventure
name_original: Big + Bang: A Spatial Medical Adventure
description:
Install instructions

Big and Bang are paramedics in space! With their special quantic ambulance, they must rush pregnant Ket and her husband Bra to the hospital. In order to avoid the obstacles in their way, they will have to switch between their physical and wave forms,

See https://github.com/Rormattio/GGJ2022
